page.title: 06MIDDLETON-ONE-ROW
page.content: Middleton-One-Row has developed slowly over the past centuries and there is now no discernable boundary between this village and the adjoining village of Middleton St. George.The main street has also developed over a number of years and therefore the age and style of the housing varies a great deal but most have an exceptionally beautiful view over the River Tees. The steep bank down to the river is grassed and tree lined, and a very popular visiting place during the summer months for the people of the surrounding district Most of the residents travel to work in Darlington, Durham and Teeside area and whilst there is a bus service to and from Darlington, the village has no Post Office or shop.
